listing.listing_description: Steps from Miami Beach, you’ll have no trouble popping in and out of the sand from this contemporary ocean-view suite at The Setai. Feel the fresh sea breeze rolling off the Atlantic each morning while you sip Nespresso on the balcony. Before you head to the beach, check out the 5-star amenities at the hotel. Drive 8-miles inland for World-class seafood, dance clubs, and outdoor shopping malls. A full-wall of ocean-facing glass lets you set the perfect mood for any occasion. Feel like cozying up on the sofa for a movie? Close the dark blinds to create a theatre-like atmosphere for a romantic night in. Having guests for dinner, show off your endless view from every section of the open-concept living/dining room. In the kitchen, you’ll find teak cabinetry and stainless steel appliances.There’s plenty of opportunity for physical activity in Miami Beach, so don’t worry about abandoning your daily routines. The Setai offers a fully-equipped kitchen center and swimming pool. After, rejuvenate with a dip in the hot tub. Then, treat yourself to an Asian-inspired dinner at their in-house restaurant, Jaya. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This three-bedroom villa boasts contemporary decor, dramatic sea views and a stunning infinity pool looking out over the Pointe Milou hillside—it’s easily one of our must-see St. Barts vacation rentals. The island of St. Barts, with its perpetual sunshine, is a tropical paradise attracting the rich and famous from around the world.Enjoy the refreshing Caribbean trade winds while lounging on one of the villa’s cozy sun beds out on the sun deck—they’re next to the infinity-edge pool that appears to blend into the ocean beyond. Grill up a casual meal on the gas barbecue and dine alfresco on the outdoor table. With Wi-Fi access throughout the villa you and your guests can stay connected during your stay, and as an extra bonus, daily housekeeping (except for Sundays and holidays), is provided to keep the villa up to par.The interior of this chic two-level home offers sleek furnishings, vaulted ceilings and stylish decor pieces. The main living room and dining area open up to the terrace and pool deck and showing off the incredible sea and island views. The gourmet kitchen is fully equipped for you to create a home-cooked meal with stainless steel appliances, and gadgets like a blender and espresso machine.The villa’s three bedrooms are divided between the two levels and can comfortably sleep up to six guests. The master, king-sized, bedroom is located on the upper level while the two other queen-sized bedrooms sit on the lower. All three rooms feature en-suite bathrooms with showers, air-conditioning, flatscreen televisions and ocean views.You will have easy access to the nearby Lorient beach as well as the Christopher Hotel’s spa services and restaurants. A 7.6 km drive brings you to the capital town, Gustavia, where you can explore the high-end boutiques and diverse restaurants.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Let go of your cares at the exquisite Lital. Rendered in glass for a nearly transparent feel, this newly built contemporary villa offers views of the white sands and turquoise waters of Anse des Cayes from nearly every room—and the calming sound of the waves from nearly every seat in the house. Personalized service, chic modern furnishings and seven suite-style bedrooms make this St. Barts vacation rental feel like your own private boutique hotel.Your stay at Lital begins with a welcome basket filled with cheese, charcuterie, wine and more, and continues with a daily continental breakfast and nightly turn-down service. The villa is laid out around a stunning pool; glass walls mean you can see through the house to the ocean even as you’re taking a swim. Stretch out in one of the lounge chairs on the pool deck, set up a game at the table and chairs or sip a drink at the indoor-outdoor bar. A second deck along the front of the house is lined with glass railings for uninterrupted views of the bay.Two expansive great rooms use whitewashed, vaulted ceilings, sliding glass walls and polished tile floors to create refined yet airy living spaces. White sofas look fresh and crisp, Møller Model 71 dining chairs with woven seats and angular lounge chairs add a hint of mid-century flair and accents such as turquoise pillows and seashell-framed mirrors speak to the oceanfront setting. Having two sitting and dining areas lets you have one table for the kids and one for the adults, with the option of letting the children watch television while the adults converse in peace—a way to add true luxury to your beach holiday. The fully equipped kitchen facilitates meals with its open air bar and practical island layout, and holds its own in style with glossy white cabinets and slate-toned countertops.Seven bedrooms, each with a king bed and en-suite bathroom, can accommodate a family with the ease of a hotel and the tranquility of a home. Relive your honeymoon in the master suite, which is set apart in its own pavilion and has an al-fresco shower and private terrace with a sitting area. The other six bedrooms are spread out over two levels of the main house and open to a balcony or terrace.You’ll need to spend at least a week in the Caribbean to visit all the nearby beaches; Anse des Cayes is less than 1.4 km away, St. Jean Bay, Shell Beach, and Flamand Beach are about 2.7 km away, and Gouverneur Beach is about 5.3 km from the villa. Discover some of the best of the island’s shopping, dining and nightlife in Gustavia, just under 2.9 km from Lital, and some of the best scenery along the Colombier Beach Trail, which begins 3.2 km away. Plan on a 1.4 km drive to Gustaf III Airport at the end of your trip.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Blackstone provides modern, gilded comfort amongst the rugged beauty of the windward side of Saint Barthélemy. Take in the serenity of Marigot Bay, relax hard as frigate birds soar overhead, or splash into the blue waters of the Caribbean just seconds away. Enjoy cool, tropical drinks from the terrace as well as the landscape, as night-lights bathe the villa’s wooden alcoves in a warm glow. What sets Blackstone apart is how it provides total convenience and modernity amid the primordial, volcanic panorama of this part of St. Bart’s. This is the ideal getaway for a large group of friends or family, with the villa easily accommodating up to 12 guests, with a range of vaulted, decadently-decorated and outfitted bedrooms. Direct access to the villa’s central terrace and pool is never more than a few steps away, with lacquered sliding doors providing versatility and ease-of-movement for all guests. Beyond Blackstone’s thoughtful incorporation into the natural landscape, guests can enjoy a huge range of facilities that are in place to meet their every need. Enjoy a refreshing run or cycle in the fitness room, devour a book or catch up with your favourite shows in the huge recreation room or sprawling sun-loungers - each guest can find their own place of peace within Blackstone. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: _ Please note that this property only accepts bookings with arrival dates within the 6 coming months. _Perched atop the exclusive Cap Estate, Villa Kessi presents sweeping views of St. Lucia’s landscape. You’ll feel positively royal as you survey your kingdom from the Atlantic Ocean, across lush green countryside to the Caribbean Sea. Kessi’s contemporary design and layout display the best of island architecture: vaulted ceilings, wooden flooring, long veranda, jalousie windows, plus wooden balconies featuring hand-carved details.A tiled deck presents the perfect location for soaking up sun from a chaise longue. Cool off in the tranquil infinity pool that offers stunning views of the island’s only 18-hole golf course. A long veranda runs the width of the house and its cozy rattan lounge set is ideal for enjoying a good book in the shade: the adjacent hammock is also a tempting choice. When the cocktail hour arrives, gather your guests around the regulation billiard table for a quick tournament.Inside, the main room’s open plan attracts those famous island trade winds, with a little help from large French doors and windows. The living room area, complete with tropical decor, is ideal for socializing or spending a quiet moment contemplating the view. The modern kitchen will get your culinary creative juices flowing. Start your day at the charming breakfast bar and finish it around an elegant dining table.Two of Kessi’s three bedrooms are found on the main floor. The first has a King size bed and the second has a King size bed and a Twin size bunk bed, making it ideal for children. Both open onto the veranda. The Master suite occupies the upper floor and is luxuriously furnished with a four-poster Super King size bed and wooden louver windows. It opens onto a private balcony with a panoramic view. All bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.Cap Estate puts you minutes away from a wealth of adventure. The island’s best golf course is your neighbor and there are several sandy beaches nearby. You’re only 6.4 km out of Rodney Bay, where you’ll find upscale shops, fine dining and a marina where you can rent a sailboat or organize excursions to Pitons or Sulphur Springs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that this property is in close proximity to a construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist.Beach Enclave is a superb residential community on Long Bay Beach, along the southeast shore of Providenciales. Designed by SWA Architects and Domino Creative Interior Designers, the villas balance high-end contemporary amenities with an emphasis on sustainability and natural materials, harmonizing with the precious ecosystem of Turks and Caicos. This seven-bedroom gem features generous alfresco living and dining areas, luminous interiors, and breathtaking views of the Caribbean Sea. A five-bedroom main house and two-bedroom guesthouse (including five king suites in all) accommodate families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to fourteen in size. Your vacation rental includes an impressive array of services and guest perks both in-house and within Beach Enclave.Perched amid lush tropical flora within steps of the sea, the gated property offers ample space for outdoor enjoyments. Tiered terraces create a graceful flow from the interiors to the white-sand beach, maximizing the ocean views on every level. Bask in the sunlight on lounge chairs lining the pool, or on the beachfront deck with accompanying wet bar. Dip into the turquoise sea and return to barbeque meals in the pergola's shade. Linger outdoors at sunset and deep into the night, sipping island cocktails in the enchanting breeze.The interiors enjoy an open-air ambiance, with wide pocket doors opening from the veranda. White surfaces accentuate the natural wood accents, subtle touches of green and blue, and exquisite ocean light. The open-concept space includes a dining table, a comfortable lounge, and a fully equipped kitchen with chef-grade appliances and breakfast bar. The kitchen joins seamlessly with the outdoor grilling station and easily serves both tables.The main house includes four suites with king beds and one with a pair of twin beds. Three of the suites open to furnished private balconies with expansive vistas, and one of the suites opens to the pool terrace. The guesthouse has two bedrooms with a shared bathroom and kitchenette, ideal for mature kids or a small family.Beach Enclave enjoys 520 feet of beach frontage along a calm stretch of sea, a perfect space for swimming and watersports. The villa is also within five kilometers of Provo Golf Club and Grace Bay Beach, and eight kilometers from Princess Alexandra National Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Walk along a palm-lined pathway, unlatch the faded wooden gate, and ascend the steps to reach your glass front door. The entire exterior of this beachfront townhouse is punctuated by soaring windows. Its ultra modern décor is a sleek contrast against the laid-back location. Peruse through luxury boutiques, dine at seaside restaurants, or enjoy martinis with the sound of live music in Bal Harbour.Glass fixtures, lacquer accents, and a sugar-white colour scheme flows throughout the living space. A sitting area, with plump sofas, invites you to gather around and enjoy a movie or stimulating conversation. Prepare a meal in the gourmet kitchen to be served at the formal dining area, furnished with a glass-topped table and leather upholstered chairs, or alfresco on the patio. An elevator ensures you reach every floor conveniently—and in style. A spacious walk-in closet in the master bedroom provides a spot to stow your vacation-ready wardrobe. Listen to the sounds of crashing waves from the rooftop terrace while laying back on a sun-drenched chaise and absorbing the immaculate view. Surfside, Miami’s swanky beachtown, is home to a variety of museums, gardens, parks, and of course, stretches of sandy shoreline. Savour culturally diverse fare, join the Miami-Dade Parks' "Turtle Rangers" as they release hatchlings into the ocean, or test your fitness levels with a vigorous bootcamp class followed by a pint of local brew. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Cayuco 1 is a superb villa in the area of Punta Cayuco, along the luxurious western shore of the Dominican Republic near Cap Cana. Featuring beautiful views of the fifth hole of Punta Esperada Golf Course, the villa is situated just minutes from the first tee and from the beach at Caleton Beach Club. Combining exquisite traditional palapa structures with contemporary comforts and amenities, the villa features spectacular alfresco and indoor living areas as well as five deluxe bedrooms sleeping sixteen, perfect for families and destination wedding guests.Hidden amid lush gardens and tall palms, the estate includes an exquisite pool terrace with ample space for luxuriating in the sun or shade. Savor sumptuous days in the Dominican sun and Atlantic breeze, bathing in the hot tub, floating in the delicious swimming pool, and sipping cocktails on stylish loungers. Enjoy an alfresco lunch in the palapa pavilion, and afternoon refreshments in the lounge. The ample terrace is perfect for entertaining guests, with lovely lighting that lets you linger deep into the night.Wide glass doors open to the living and dining pavilion, where a sumptuous lounge and dining table set the stage for feasts and festivities. The high ceilings and open wall invite a lovely breeze into your evenings, while ceiling fans and central air keep you cool. From this pavilion, an enchanting alfresco pathway—flanked by luminous moats with palm trees in island planters—conveys you to the interior lounge, kitchen, and bedrooms suites.The villa includes five bedrooms distributed on its two levels. The upper floor features the spectacular master suite with private terrace, as well as a guestroom with two queen beds and a balcony. The first floor includes a king bedroom and two rooms with two queens each, all opening directly to the pool terrace. All of the villa's bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms.Cayuco 1 enjoys one of the finest locations in Punta Cayuco. In addition to serene seclusion, you'll enjoy outstanding proximity to Punta Espalda Golf Course (just a four-minute drive from your door) and Caleton Beach Club. You're also within a ten-minute walk of tennis courts and Golden Bear Lodge. Scape Adventure Park is ten minutes away by car, and Cap Cana Marina about fourteen minutes.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: La Favorita’s view dazzles the moment you enter the villa. Your eyes flow from the cool interior out to a stunning collection of blues. The horizon unites the cerulean pool and sapphire Caribbean with the rich azure sky.The villa’s style is French Caribbean meets Moroccan. The fully air conditioned open plan great room is airy and white with vaulted ceilings. The interior’s multiple seating areas optimize the view. Stylish, comfortable furniture in pure white complements the exotic banquette backed by Moroccan arches. Dark woods and interesting object d’art add visual appeal. The elegant kitchen with high-end appliances opens to the view and the outdoor dining areas.The outside spaces are beautifully detailed. A covered terrasse surrounds the pool while palm filled planters; terrace plantings and a huge palm soar through the sun deck. At one end of the pool is a fabulous outdoor great room divided into areas for lounging and elegant al-fresco dining. The large sloping entry pool runs almost the entire length of the terrace. At the opposite side of the terrace is a plunge pool perfect for children or simply relaxing.Two bedrooms are on the upper level; one on the lower level. All have ocean views. Each has a relaxed contemporary feel in serene white and dark woods accented with pops of colors. The upper level bedrooms are large and spacious with private seating inside and outside. The lower level bedroom is a large suite with private covered terrace and comfortable indoor lounging. Each bedroom has beautiful spa style bathrooms with tumble marble tiles and large walk in showers; two have outdoor showers; one opens to the garden.Although secluded, you are close to amenities. You are 2 minutes to the restaurants in Porto Cupecoy; five minutes to the airport and 10 minute to the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case or Philipsburg’s shopping haven.

listing.listing_description: Welcome to Atlantis, a Caribbean villa with a distinct modern flair. Atlantis sits on top of a hill overlooking some of the best views in Saint Lucia. The sloping parkland around the villa is beautifully manicured, with many well established trees and tropical shrubs, low-walled planters and a carefully tended kitchen garden springing into bounty after years of green-fingered care.The curved driveway leads to a generous parking area, and the impressive but welcoming entrance, with its elegant coral stone staircase framed by an arched portico and stately double doors. The single storey villa’s walls are built from natural local stone, and the arch motif is repeated throughout the exterior and interior, including the stylish but eminently functional solid wood windows whose shape exactly echo the architectural detail. Atlantis is a unique property in many ways, and the villa’s recent clever, high end upgrade has resulted in a crisp, modern look with an historic, old Caribbean feel.Step inside, and the 8000 square foot home beckons in all directions. The immediate centre of attention is the indoor gated courtyard, with its soothing water feature and deep koi pond open to the blue sky above, a surprisingly Italianate feature in this Saint Lucian family home, throwing light and air throughout the adjacent great room and casual living area.The living space has two areas: the formal lounge looks onto the villa’s capacious wrap-around verandah and pool deck, through tall, wide French windows which echo the arched style of the entrance. The interior walls are beautiful, textural mixture of coral stone and natural local stone, its silvery grey tones contrasting with the high vaulted, dark stained ceiling, an original feature which was hand-crafted from beautifully finished natural wood. A casual-style television den lies to the right off the main living space, and the kitchen and formal dining room open up to the left.From crisp white cabinetry and modern fixtures to granite countertops and state of the art appliances, the family kitchen at Atlantis is spacious enough for casual dining, and impressively appointed for entertaining. It leads to the formal dining room, with its solid wood, refectory style table and seating room for eight to twelve.Through every arched window of Atlantis there is a breathtaking panorama, and a step through any one of the French windows reveals some of the villa’s extensive views. The outdoor living area is a seamless extension of indoors, with comfortable areas for relaxing and dining, and access to the 60’ infinity pool with its bird’s eye vantage of the hills and golf course below. To the west, the panorama extends from Mount Pimard and Rodney Bay to Pigeon Island, with Martinique sometimes visible on the horizon. To the east, the wraparound verandah peeks towards the Atlantic off Cas En Bas Bay: all around the property, balmy breezes and shady corners keep the indoor and outdoor spaces cool all day long.Several guest bedrooms are laid out in an interlocking floor plan off the beautiful indoor/outdoor atrium off the courtyard. Cathedral ceilings and lots of arched windows ensure every bedroom is bright and airy. There are 5 bedrooms in total, the master is located to the left of the courtyard and has a queen size bed and an ensuite bathroom. Two more bedrooms, one with a queen bed and another with two double beds share a large Jack and Jill bathroom. To the left of this bedroom is another queen bedroom with an ensuite bathroom and between the two is a cosy television room, complete with DVD and a small movie selection. The last of the 5 bedrooms has a queen bed and its own bathroom which is located across the hallway.Atlantis is a unique and impressive property, sprawling and spacious, but with a warm and welcoming family ambiance, and a layout designed for entertaining. Perched on top of its hilltop vantage point, secluded yet private Atlantis boasts a 10 minute drive to most amenities and attractions of Rodney Bay.

listing.listing_description: There’s nothing petite about the scope of this waterfront St. Martin estate, whether the expanse of the open-concept great room, the plump sofas lining the veranda, or the hospitality offered by the staff. The horseshoe-shaped pool mirrors the curve of the beach just beneath the terrace wall, and the views stretch to the opposite side of the bay. Gourmet Grand-Case village is 10 minutes away. Follow the steps past the covered al-fresco sitting and dining areas and into the pool, or pour a glass from the wine cooler to sip at the pool’s built-in bench. Heat up the barbecue as the sun sinks lower in the sky, and after the stars come out, flip on the mosquito trap, soak in the hot tub, or gather around the satellite TV and Wi-Fi inside.Tiled roofs, arched windows, and a courtyard bursting with palms and flowering shrubs lend this vacation rental plenty of traditional charm. Columns and slide-away glass walls mark the transition from the outdoor living areas to an indoor great room with sitting and dining areas; an arched doorway leads to a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.This luxury property has five bedroom with king beds and one studio bedroom with two twin beds that’s ideal for the older cousins if you’re traveling with extended family. Follow a marble staircase to the master king bedroom, a honeymoon-worthy retreat with its own terrace overlooking the sea. All six bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, TVs and fridges.A holiday on Petite Plage is a stay in the heart of St. Martin’s gourmet scene. There is, of course, the mile-long stretch of sandy beach, which has plenty of great swimming and snorkeling spots. But you’re also a 10-minute walk to Grand-Case village, home to some of the best restaurants in the Caribbean and even a perfumery where you can bottle your own scent.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The centerpiece of this very private estate property is an elegant 8000 square foot, six-bedroom villa filled with spacious indoor and outdoor living. Lush and colorful tropical gardens, grand entry courtyard and expansive lawns surround the house. The mood is tropical exotic and inviting with the feel of a private home in Bali.The villa’s stunning panoramic views are accented by the brilliant turquoise sea, sandy beaches, sloping mountains and the charming town of Marigot. Multi-level sitting areas for dining or relaxing, both covered and open, surround the pool to take full advantage of the variegated view from dawn to dusk. The exotic rainforest style pool, complete with waterfall, adds visual interest by day and by night via fiber optics. At pool level is the barbeque and bar plus an additional dining space.The flow of the house creates a perfect villa for large family gathering, good friends or small corporate retreats. The interiors are serene and comfortable. The main living space features a large, open plan room with soaring ceilings, Indonesian style seating and accessories, a modern high end fully equipped kitchen plus a state of the art sound system and media facilities. Tumbled travertine floors flow throughout the interior and exterior spaces.Bedrooms include two off the living room, one upper and one lower, each with private sitting areas. Descend the outside stairs to the two bedroom suite with a shared media room and terrace. Two more bedrooms are in private casitas surrounded by lush gardens. Every bedroom is furnished Indonesian style in soft creams, whites and sand beige tones. Each has a soothing marble, spa-style bathroom featuring big walk-in showers and carved stone sinks.Although you might never wish to leave the house, you are walking distance to Baie Rouge Beach, ten minutes to Porto Cupecoy’s fabulous restaurants and seven minutes to the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, the Creole Market, galleries and shopping. Only 10 minutes from the International SXM airport and 30 minutes to both Grand Case and Phillipsburg.

listing.listing_description: _ Please note that this property is in close proximity to a construction project. For more information, please contact a Villa Specialist. _ Fall in love all over again at BelAmour. Envisioned as an intimate hideaway on the coast near Pointe Milou, this St. Barts luxury residence was designed to pamper just the two of you with its ocean views and sophisticated interiors. It’s the perfect place to rekindle a romance or escape for a honeymoon in the sun.The villa’s cliffside perch commands views across the Caribbean Sea to the islets of Bonhomme, Fregate and Toc Vert–and even to neighboring St. Maarten and Anguilla on the clearest days. See what you can spot from outdoor living spaces with an infinity pool, barbecue, and lounging and dining areas. In the evenings, relax in front of the Apple TV or check in with friends and family at home over Wi-Fi.A slide-away glass wall is all that separates the villa’s great room from the terrace and the sea views. But the vistas are just as gorgeous inside, thanks to a wall-to-wall piece by French artist Jean-Charles de Castelbajac. Stretch out in the open-concept living and dining areas and, when you need to eat, whip up something delicious in the adjacent fully equipped kitchen.The single bedroom at BelAmour has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and ocean views. Like the rest of this vacation rental, it’s designed to envelop you in luxe textures and statement-making pieces, starting with a bed imported from Bali and continuing with designer fabrics.While you could spend your holiday simply enjoying each other’s company in your private retreat, it’s easy to explore the island. The villa’s location puts you less than a 10-minute drive from Lorient and Grand Cul de Sac beaches. Try a new water sport or have a drink with the jet set in St. Jean, or find more shopping and dining choices in charming Gustavia.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Hawksbill is a private eight bedroom villa located in the coveted Grace Bay area of Turks and Caicos. This luxury estate home has been spread across a number of separate buildings and designed as a multigenerational retreat. Showcasing contemporary Caribbean design that is both transitional and responsive to the individual personalities of guests, Hawksbill makes a great bet for a large family holiday, an impressive corporate retreat, unforgettable weddings and other special events. It can be rented as a 5, 6, 8 or even a 10 bedroom villa if combined with the adjacent beach house.The grounds at this stunning vacation rental feature a long swimming pool perfect for laps, a hot tub, a fire pit and an extensive stone terrace. There’s also a gym, basketball and a tennis court near the entrance to the property. The main house accommodates a beautiful and stately Great Room with unrivaled views over Grace Bay. A separate family space houses games and a big screen TV.The open plan living and dining area inside Hawksbill is framed by a high vaulted ceiling and an elegant overhead lighting fixture. Plenty of windows allow natural light to flood over the comfortable couches and magnificent formal dining area. The kitchen and screened terrace open to the outside.Head up the cantilevered walnut staircase projecting from a native stone wall to the stunning master suite with fully pocketing doors and ocean views. On the opposite side of the pool from the main house is the stand alone master suite for ultimate privacy. An elevated two bedroom guest house with its own kitchen and living space sit behind the main house. Eight exquisite bedrooms accommodate up to sixteen guests at this non-smoking villa.In 2015, Grace Bay was awarded TripAdvisor’s coveted ‘Traveler’s Choice’ award for the top quality of its soft sands and clear waters. Nearby outdoor activities include kite surfing, snorkeling, scuba diving and golf. Or try a scooter tour for a change of pace, possibly the best way to see a sunny island that’s only a few miles across. Nature lovers should be sure to check out Little Water Cay, a natural habitat full of friendly iguanas.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

feature.p: Please note that when booking Hawksbill Estate (Hawksbill + Beach House), the total nightly rate increases and a 10% service charge is applied. Please see Hawksbill Estate for total pricing.

listing.listing_description: Say goodbye to your cares at the relaxed South Wave. With its views of lush hillsides and sparkling ocean, its ambience of contemporary luxury and location within walking distance of Toiny Beach, this St. Barts vacation rental will help you settle into a more laid-back rhythm. Reserve its two bedrooms to reconnect with friends and family or as your destination for a Caribbean honeymoon.Your holiday at South Wave begins with an escort to the villa and a meet-and-greet on your arrival, and includes daily housekeeping. Revel in the island and ocean views from a terrace with a heated infinity pool, al-fresco areas for living, lounging and dining, and a barbecue. In the evenings, unwind with the help of the Apple and satellite TVs, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi.The villa gets its breezy modern vibe from crisp white walls, an open-concept great room and a vaulted ceiling. Slide open the glass wall to let the breezes off the water float through the living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen. Wicker furniture and coral walls add to the beachy appeal.Each of the two bedrooms at South Wave has a queen bed, private en-suite bathroom, Apple and satellite TVs, and air conditioning, and opens to a balcony facing the neighboring hillsides or the horizon. One of the bedrooms also has its own al-fresco rain shower.While it might be hard to tear yourself away from the villa’s pool, it’s worth making the 5-minute walk to Toiny Beach, a quiet stretch that’s perfect for a stroll and a favorite with surfers, or the 4-minute drive to either Grand Cul de Sac Beach or Petit Cul de Sac Beach. Bring your camera for a scenic hike along Colombier Beach Trail or your sweetheart for a romantic dinner in charming downtown Gustavia.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Marvel at the sunset from your private hot tub at this oceanfront villa on St. Martin. Walk barefoot to Plum Bay Beach for a swim in the surf, and return to cocktail parties under the starry sky. Perched in the prestigious Terres Basses area on the island's west coast, Giselle balances vintage Caribbean elegance, state-of-the-art comforts, and an open, free-flowing design that bathes your every moment in the spirit of the sea. The symmetrical house features a capacious central living room opening to a shaded veranda and expansive pool terrace with panoramic ocean views. The terrace is perfect for special parties or carefree days under the immense sky, while the covered lounge area forms a cool retreat for afternoon refreshments or cocktail parties.A light-filled kitchen forms the fulcrum of the home, with a 2-sided window bar serving the veranda and terrace. The main dining room includes a table for 12 beneath vaulted ceilings of whitewashed wood, with wide thresholds creating a breezy, alfresco ambiance. The spacious living room balances an ancient minimalism with vintage modern-chic furniture and Buddhist artwork, perfect for lively gatherings or tranquil relaxation into the wee hours.Four of the villa's bedrooms open directly to the pool terrace, while the fifth suite enjoys extra privacy with its own entrance and kitchenette. All have king beds, ensuite bathrooms, and air conditioning, providing comfortable havens for a family, group of friends, or destination wedding guests.While Giselle's location on the island's westernmost edge offers some of the finest views and beach access on St. Martin, it's also within easy reach of the island's main towns and nightlife spots. Enjoy the vibrant markets of nearby Marigot, the world-class shopping in Philipsburg, and some of the region's most renowned restaurants in Grand Case.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
